name: @gabber12
body:
## What am i working on?

### [Slides.vim](https://gabber12.github.io/slides.vim/)
  - A python package allowing markdown to be presented right in vim

### [TechNews Aggregation](https://github.com/gabber12/hacky-lobster)
  - A React-native app for browsing through list of tech communities like hackernews and lobste.rs

## Contact Me
Checkout out my [Blog](https://gabber12.me)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
